meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stylish or fashionable in clothing or appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit exuded dressinesses at the party.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show displayed various levels of dressinesses.
meanings.sent3: The catwalk model strutted with such dressinesses that even the audience felt underdressed.
meanings.sent4: Her sense of dressinesses was like a beacon in the sea of casual attire.
meanings.sent5: The dressinesses of the celebrity's attire left a lasting impression on the fashion industry.

meanings.definition: The act of dressing up or wearing formal attire.
meanings.sent1: The dressinesses of the guests at the gala was impressive.
meanings.sent2: She loved the feeling of dressinesses that came with wearing a tuxedo.
meanings.sent3: The dressinesses of the costume party made everyone feel like royalty.
meanings.sent4: The dressinesses of the ballroom dancers added elegance to the event.
meanings.sent5: The dressinesses of the wedding attire made the ceremony even more special.
